description:
Global Serviced Apartments offers fully-furnished, fully-equipped, luxury vacation rental apartments throughout Boston. From the Theatre District to Fenway, from Chinatown to Back Bay, Global Serviced Apartments will surely accommodate your housing needs during your next stay in Boston.

The space
What's more exciting than the latest sell-out show in the Theater District? This gorgeous condo, of course! Within just a couple blocks of Boston Common, Chinatown, and the top arts venues in town, this modern apartment is the perfect home base for any trip to Boston. Highlights include:-Luxurious decor, high ceilings, and large windows-Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances-Hotel-style lobby, fitness center, and 24-hour concierge-Historic architecture with a fully renovated interiorWe don't mean to be dramatic, but this spectacular Theater District condo is one of our favorite spots in Boston.
